casebody.data:
MEINCK
v.
CITY OF GASTONIA 130PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2017 Thomas D. Bumgardner, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Meinck, Joan A. Martha Raymond Thompson, Attorney at Law, Gastonia, Ryan L. Bostic, Attorney at Law, for City of Gastonia.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 26th of June 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of June 2017."

*423Defendant shall have up to and including the 10th day of August 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
